janathawage awashyatha wenuwen kriyathmaka wiya yuthu podu rajya mandalaya danduwam dime ho winishchaya kirime aayathanayak nowiya yuthu bawa podu rajya mandalaye abhinawa sabhapathi janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha awadharanaya ‡∑ôkaleya.podu rajya mandalaye aramuna wanne samajika ratawal athara sahayogithawa godanangamin ekinekata upakara kirima bawa prakasha kala janadhipathiwaraya podu dhanayata wada podu dilindukama thuran kirimata apa awadhanaya yomu wiya yuthu bawa pawasiya.janadhipathiwaraya mese prakasha kale podu rajya mandalaye 22 wani rajya nayaka samuluwe samarambhaka ulelata kolambaa nelum pokuna mahinda rajapaksha ranga shalawedi eeye (15) ek wemini.podu rajya mandalaye aarambhaka samajikayan ata denagen ek samajikayaku lesa wasara 24kata pasu aasiyawe pawathwena prathama samuluwe sathkarakathwaya shri lankawata labima sathutata karunak bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya samuluwa pawathwimata hakiyawa labune thrasthawadaya parajaya kara rate samaya saha sthayithawa thahawuru kirima nisa bawa pawasiya.thrasthawadaya nisa digu kalak me rate janathawata samaya saha sthayithawa ahimi wi thibunu bawath thrasthawadaya nima kota usasma manawa himikama wana jiwathwime ayithiya thahawuru kirimata haki wu bawath janadhipathiwaraya prakasha kaleya.
